org.libgit2.jagged

Class Options

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.libgit2.jagged.Options

  • public final class Options
extends Object
    Configurable options for libgit2.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Options.CacheStatistics
      The current statistics for the object cache.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Options.CacheStatistics getCachedStatistics()
      Gets the cache statistics, the allowed size of the cache and the current usage.
      static long getMmapWindowMappedLimit()
      Gets the maximum amount of memory that can be mapped by the library.
      static long getMmapWindowSize()
      Gets the maximum window size used to memory map files.
      static String getSearchPath(ConfigurationLevel level)
      Gets the search path(s) for a given configuration level.
      static void setCacheMaxSize(long max)
      Sets the maximum size for the object cache.
      static void setCacheObjectLimit(ObjectType type, long size)
      Sets the maximum size for the given type of object to be eligible for caching, or 0 to indicate that the those type of objects should not be cached.
      static void setEnableCaching(boolean enabled)
      Sets whether object caching should be enabled for repositories.
      static void setMmapWindowMappedLimit(long limit)
      Sets the maximum amount of memory that can be mapped by the library.
      static void setMmapWindowSize(long size)
      Sets the maximum window size used to memory map files.
      static void setSearchPath(ConfigurationLevel level, String path)
      Sets the search path(s) for configuration data, shared attributes and ignore files for a given configuration level, or null to reset default search path.

      • setSearchPath

        public static void setSearchPath(ConfigurationLevel level,
                 String path)
        Sets the search path(s) for configuration data, shared attributes and ignore files for a given configuration level, or null to reset default search path. Multiple paths can be specified if they are separated by the file path separator. The value $PATH can be specified in order to use the existing path value.
        Parameters:
        level - the configuration level
        path - the path(s) to search or null to reset defaults

      • getSearchPath

        public static String getSearchPath(ConfigurationLevel level)
        Gets the search path(s) for a given configuration level.
        Parameters:
        level - the configuration level
        Returns:
        the path(s) to search

      • setEnableCaching

        public static void setEnableCaching(boolean enabled)
        Sets whether object caching should be enabled for repositories.
        Parameters:
        enabled - true to enable caching, false otherwise

      • setCacheObjectLimit

        public static void setCacheObjectLimit(ObjectType type,
                       long size)
        Sets the maximum size for the given type of object to be eligible for caching, or 0 to indicate that the those type of objects should not be cached.
        Parameters:
        type - the object type
        size - the maximum object size to cache or 0

      • setCacheMaxSize

        public static void setCacheMaxSize(long max)
        Sets the maximum size for the object cache.
        Parameters:
        max - the maximum size of the cache

      • getCachedStatistics

        public static Options.CacheStatistics getCachedStatistics()
        Gets the cache statistics, the allowed size of the cache and the current usage.
        Returns:
        the cache statistics
